name: Expressjs.com
body:
# ExpressJS.com

  The site for Express.

## Building

Setup:

```
$ npm install -g serve
$ npm install
$ make
$ serve . &
$ open http://localhost:3000
```

then rebuild changes with:

```
$ make
```

## Contributing

  - __dont__ edit the HTML directly, edit the _jade_.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
